name: Kill Bill Vol. 2 Quiz / Test | Kill Bill Vol. 2 . | 10 Questions

questions.text: What was the name of the wedding chapel "The Bride" was getting married at?
questions.explanation:
Two Pines.

	Two Pines Wedding Chapel was the site of a massacre occurring four years before "The Bride" began her revenge.  The Deadly Viper Assassination Squad (or DiVAS) were responsible.

Flute.

	Bill plays his flute in Chapter 6, when "The Bride" talks to him at the Two Pines Wedding Chapel.  His Assassination Squad soon massacres the wedding rehearsal.

questions.text: What does Budd shoot "The Bride" with?
questions.explanation:
Rocksalt.

	A double dose of rocksalt literally knocks "The Bride" off her feet.  Since he only used rocksalt, she doesn't die, but she's in an extreme amount of pain.

questions.text: On which eye does Elle Driver (California Mountain Snake) have her eye patch?
questions.explanation:
Right.

	"The Bride" rips out Elle's left eye during their battle leaving Elle permanently blind.

Pai Mei.

	Pai Mei was killed by Elle Driver (California Mountain Snake) after he ripped out her right eye.  She fed him poisoned fish heads.

Elle.

	Elle poisons Budd with a Black Mamba snake, which was "The Bride's" code name as a member of the Deadly Viper Assassination Squad.

questions.text: What is the name of "The Bride's" daughter?
questions.explanation:
BB.

	Bill and Beatrix both have a daughter named BB.  Beatrix doesn't know her daughter is alive until the end of "Kill Bill Vol. 1", and she meets her daughter in "Vol. 2".

questions.text: What is in the dart that Bill shoots "The Bride" with?
questions.explanation:
Truth Serum.

	He makes Beatrix keep the dart in her knee for about five minutes while he rambles on about a theory he has.  He and Beatrix go on to battle with Hatori Hanzo Swords.

Yes.

	"The Bride" kills Bill using Pai Mei's Five Point Palm Exploding Heart Technique.  She and her daughter live life happily ever after.

questions.text: What is "The Bride's" real first name?
questions.explanation:
Beatrix.

	Beatrix's name was beeped out every time someone mentioned it.  It is unknown why this was so, other than to make us feel more for the character and plot.  Her last name is Kiddo, and we are led to believe everyone calling her "kiddo" is a term of endearment.  Hope you enjoyed the movie and my quiz.
